name: Articulated Camera
description: The scene is filmed with a moving camera most often operated by someone not necessarily participating in the action.

name: Augmented Reality
description: Video or CGI content designed to be combined with your current visual surroundings, e.g. DeoVR / SexLikeReal using chroma key ("green screen") or alpha transparency

name: Back Shot
description: When the performer back is facing the camera

name: Blacklight
description: Scene uses ultraviolet (UV) light.

name: CGI
description: Features digitally created special effects or backgrounds.

name: Chroma Key
description: Video with artificial background.

name: Close Up
description: Performer's body-part (unspecified) fills most of the screen.

name: Close Up Ass
description: Performer's ass fills most of the screen.

name: Close Up Breasts
description: Performer's breasts fill most of the screen.

name: Close Up Face
description: Performer's face fills most of the screen.

name: Close Up Feet
description: Performer's feet fill most of the screen.

name: Close Up Pussy
description: Performer's pussy fills most of the screen.

name: Cuckold - POV
description: Scenes shot from the perspective of the cuckholded party.

name: Deep Fake
description: Usage of AI and ML techniques to replace one person's likeness convincingly with that of another

name: Depth of Field
description: Camera effect that simulates the focal properties of a real-world camera lens by blurring the background of an image while objects in the foreground stay in focus.

name: Fisheye
description: Virtual reality scenes shot using a fisheye lens

name: Fixed Camera
description: Recorded from a camera that does not have an operator/cameraman.

name: Front Shot
description: Performer is seen facing the camera

name: Grayscale
description: Features video entirely in shades of black, white, and gray.

name: High Angle
description: A high-angle shot is a cinematography technique where the camera points down on the subject from above.

name: High Dynamic Range
description: The video is shot and encoded in a way that allows a wider gamut of colours to be stored using a different or extended coulour space than normal

name: Low Ambient Lighting
description: Footage shot in a low ambient lighting environment, such as a darkened room lit by an existing lamp or outside at night underneath a streetlamp, with either no or minimal added lighting.

name: Low Angle
description: A low-angle shot is when the camera is positioned low on the vertical axis, below the level of the eyeline, and looks up at an object or subject above.

name: Motion Blur
description: When the image is blurry due to movement

name: One Shot
description: Scenes filmed in one take by a single camera without any apparent cuts.

name: Plow Cam
description: Doggy Style or Prone Bone while filming from the front

name: Sepia
description: Orange looking filter

name: Side Shot
description: Performer is seen from their side

name: Silhouette
description: Use of backlight to cast shadows or obscure details of the shot.

name: Slow Mo
description: A shot in which time appears to be slowed down.

name: Soft Glow
description: Video effect which gives footage a dream-like appearance, similar to a light Gaussian blur filter; “Vaseline on camera lens”

name: Split Screen
description: Shows multiple camera angles at the same time.

name: Thigh Focus
description: A closeup or an emphasis on the Thigh area of the performer

name: Toe Focus
description: When the toes are the emphasis of the scene or image. This include the performer grabbing objects with his toes.

name: Upper-body Shot
description: A shot where only the head to waist part of the performer are visible

name: Vertical Video
description: Scene in an upright video format, e. g. shot with a cellphone

name: X-Ray
description: Internal organs being visible through the skin or from the inside. Mostly used in Hentai
